event.text: Oh I see a huge dune ahead! It will be a good spot to rest and do some recon.
I see greenlands from here! I guess I'm closer and closer to base every day.
I see greenlands from here! I guess I'm closer and closer to base every day.
Wherever I look, the only thing I see is an endless desert... This temperature is burdensome. I already barely can handle this. How long will it last?!
It's still far away from base, but I'm holding good. I'm optimistic about this journey.
It's still far away from base, but I'm holding good. I'm optimistic about this journey.
Oh shit! A huge scorpiolooking monster just dug out of the sand!
OK, I'm not afraid. Just keep a cool head.
I've defeated it. It wasn't an easy task but I have too much experience in this. I'll collect its guts and move on.
Finally it's dead. Unfortunetely it stinged me during the fight and a toxin is in my body. I don't feel any strong effects, just I'm a bit weaker.
I'm not strong enough to kill it. I have to escape!
I think I'm safe now. Running on sand is hard and exhausting. Oh shit, I lost something! I'm almost 100% sure that I put something in this pocket.
Oh fuck! It had me! It cut my skin in few places but the worst thing is that it stinged me! I'm still not sure how I escaped.

I couldn't run away from it! This freaking scorpio was too fast! It used its claws and stinged me and it came to eating me, I kicked it in the face. The creature was unexpecting such a plot twist and confused started to retreat.

I was too afraid to do anything. I just stayed there like an idiot na watched the scorpioid approaching. I regained control of myself but it was too late. Those claws were terrible, shredding my skin... At some point it even stinged me... But for some reason it left me. I have no idea why, but I will take advantage of that!
Hey! There's a dead tree over there! Probably there is something inside it!
I found some strange wrinkled fruits! Propably some animal had hidden them here, but they are mine now!
Well... There is nothing here... Could've predicted.
Well... There is nothing here... Could've predicted.
Ouch! A splinter jabbed my finger! And there is nothing here... What a disappointment...
Nothing happens here. Only sand laying aroud. It's nice time to rest.
The sand around me is shaking and only in small radius! I'd better leave it fast!
Oh fuck! What a monstrosity came out from the ground! It's a huge worm with maw bigger than me!... The fight was tough but I did it. I slayed that monster.
Oh! There was a package in its maw! Wow! It's a weapon!
Oh! There was a package in its maw! It has some food inside!

Oh crap! A huge worm came out from the ground! So disgusting!... Uh... The fight was very demanding but it turned out that I am to be the winner today. At least I found a package of food that probably belonged to other explorer.
Oh shit! A huge worm came out of sand just in place where I was standing! Thankfully I managed to escape.

Ugh... I've just experienced the worst thing in my life. I had been wandering through the desert and suddenly a worm came out just under me! I had been in its maw being crushed by its teeth! Somehow I had jumped out of there. The worm hadn't noticed it and had got back under ground.

Ugh... I survived something that seems impossible to surive. I was wandering through the desert and suddenly a worm came out just under me! I was in its maw being crushed by its teeth! Somehow I jumped out of there. The worm didn't notice it and got back under ground.
Huh? There's piece of Aetherite. Little things also have to be apprieciated!
Shit, a sandstorm is approaching... I'd better put my tent and wait until it's gone.
Shit, a sandstorm is approaching... I'd better put my tent and wait until it's gone. Man, it's huge. Looks like I will have to stay there for longer time than expected.
Oh crap... A sandstorm caught me by surprise!
Oh crap... A sandstorm caught me by surprise! It's the biggest I've seen in my life!
I came across a strange plant, or at least I believe it's a plant. It has many branches full of thorns on them.
A blink from beneath it caught my eye. I'll try to pull it out without injuring myself. Success! It was an Aetherite rock!
A blink from beneath it caught my eye. I'll try to pull it out without injuring myself. Success! It was piece of scrapped metal!
I'm pretty sure I see something under it. I'll try to take it without touching any thorns. Ouch! I was too impatient, but I've got some Aetherite so I think it was worth it.
There's something beneath it! I'll try to get it... No no, that's it. I'm outta here. The thorns are placed too densely! I even have some of them in my arm!.
I'd better leave it undisturbed.
Woah, there is a strange sand in front of me! It looks like quicksand! Few more steps and I would have been trapped! Phew...
Well, the sand feels different here. ... Oh crap! I'm getting lower and lower! It is a quicksand!... Ok, I managed to get out of this trap. But I lost some resources.
Looks like there was a forest before. Maybe I can find something here.
A piece of Aetherite. Nice!
This place give me chills. I feel observed by something.
Shh... There is a scorpioid here!
OK, it's safe now. I killed it. At least I got some meat from it.
OK, it's safe now. I killed it but I'm not left untouched. I'll collect meat from it.
It's approaching!
I lost it! I hope so.
I think I lost it, but some of my food is missing.
Shit! It catched me but I managed to escape. Unfortunately I lost a few items.
Shit! It stinged me! Somehow it lost track of me. I lost few items during my escape.
Oh shit! Is it... is it a human corpse? Oh my...
I know it's unethical but in this conditions I have to search this body.
There is a package of building materials. I think I'll take it.
I found a half full Aetherite container. We'll make use of it.
This battery seems to be charged. This man would not use it anyway.
Oh nice! I'll take that piece of equipment, my friend. I won't let it rust it on this damned desert.
I see a corpse of an animal in a distance. It looks like a giant Earth scorpio.
Decay process is in advanced state, but I still could find some untouched flesh.
It's too rotten. I'd better leave it as it is.
Ough! It's covered by some sticky goo! I should leave it.
Woah! This dune is moving! It's like a sand avalanche! And it's coming to me!
I think I'm far enough. This sand falling down... It's a great sight from here...
OK, it should be safe from up here. I'm pretty sure something fell out of my backpack.
Oh crap! It's really close! Gotta go fast!... Ok, I escaped that avalanche but I lost some resources. Damn it!
Oh fuck! It's too fast! Oh no... Ough... My suit is full of sand! I have to crawl out...
What? Rain? Here? Yeah... it's nice, cause the air got cooler, but sand transforms into some kind of mud. Yeah... Great...
Is it really true? I see a green spot on a horizon! It's an oasis! I have to investigate it!
I found many fruits on a tree similar to a palm tree!
I found some fruits on a strange spiky plant! It's strange that it grows in oasis but still I have more food.
I found a few hairy fruits on a tree that looks like a palm! I hope they are eatable.
I found a few fruits on a strange spiky plant! It's strange that it grows in oasis but still I have more food so I shouldn't complain.
Something moved in the bushes!
It is a some kind of ratlooking creature! I killed it and it seems that this rat is fleshy.
It ran off! What a shame... More food is never bad.
It ran off! What a shame... I didn't even have the chance to see it!
It keeps moving there! I'd better leave it alone.
Oh fuck! This slope started to collapse when I was walking on it! Now I slide on this massive sand avalanche!
Woah! It's a lot of fun! Sadly it's over now.
It's scary! Help me! Oh... It is over... finally...
Man, it's so hot here. Even the temperature control cannot keep up with this amount of heat.
And I'm so tired...
I see a huge rock made of Aetherite! It's glowing and calling me!
No no no, this must be hallucinations. I have to rest.

Yes! Yes! All that fortune is mine! Wait... Where is it?! Where the fuck is it?! It was right here! Where did my fortune go?!... Oh... My head... I'm not feeling good... It must've been some hallucinations. I forgot to take one of my bags with me. Now I will never find it... I have to rest.
Wind has gone crazy in last few minutes. I hope it won't form a sandstorm.
Oh my! It just teared off one of my bags!
Oh my! It just teared off one of my bags!
Some creatures are crawling out of the ground around me! They look loathsomely disgusting!
I've seen similar animals before. They were afraid of the light so maybe those ones are too?
They ran away in panic. Phew, that was close.
Oh, c'mon! The light doesn't want to work! C'mon, c'mon... It's too late. We will have to do it the hard way.
Fight with so many enemies was hard but I proved that quality is more important than quantity.
There were too many of them! Thankfully I escaped and it seems safe now.
I was to weak... Luckily they didn't appreciate the taste of my armour.
But I don't have any light source with me. Fuck! I will have to fight them.
Fight with so many enemies was hard but I proved that quality is more important than quantity.
There were too many of them! Thankfully I escaped and it seems safe now.
I was to weak... Luckily they didn't appreciate the taste of my armour.
Disgusting or not, I will have to kill them!
Fight with so many enemies was hard but I proved that quality is more important than quantity.
There were too many of them! Thankfully I escaped and it seems safe now.
I was to weak... Luckily they didn't appreciate the taste of my armour.
There is some huge field of metal waste! Oh wait... It looks more like an early spaceship crashed here!
I found some metal scraps in usable state. Nice!
There is Aetherite container! So someone has been here before to collect this mineral!
There is a portable food freezer sticking out of sand! I bet there is still something inside!
I see a battery! Let's hope it's charged.
Man... The sight in front of me is depressing... There is nothing but dust and dead grass and bushes... I literally feel how it sucks any motivation from me.
